attributes.action: take the action of explaining whether it is Lord Mandelson or Mr Blair who has the greater influence on his actions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Your petition must relate to government policy and call for a recognisable action. The word "explain" along with words such as "apologise", "recognise" or "acknowledge" are not considered recognisable actions.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
